TopicTitle: Missing Group Actions for Rover Wheels and Fuel Cells

Articles.Content:
I'm seriously missing these 2 group actions:

- Fuel Cells need a 'Toggle on/off' group action. Right now they have only 'Start' and 'Stop' so if i want to toggle them via group action keys i have to waste 2 groups. If they would have a toggle option i could set this into the same group that toggles engines on my crafts. Would make a lot of sense, don't ya's think?

- Rover Wheels: Missing group action 'Shutdown Motor'. Any other jet or rocket engine has a shutdown option, but rovers are missing it. I use shutdown to make sure all engines are off and it would be really nice if the same worked for rover wheels. It would be even greater, if 2 new key-bound standard action groups would be introduced, 'Power Up' and 'Power Down'. Then it would be possible to set all start and stop actions that are usually used for a model into these 2 groups.

But for me, there's something that can be even more important. There were about 2 suggestion threads about this before, it must be added.

For new players, you don't have to talk about action groups early, as you have buttons for the main action groups: Lights, Gears, Brakes. A button for solar panels would be more useful than the Brakes button. New players don't always know how to extend solar panels. Or if they know, they might find it too sticky. Also, adding solar panels to an action group is unnecessary micromanagement. Just like with lights, solar panels should have a pre-made action group.
